PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07532024-06-21NR
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of RAVINDRA N. MOHABEER of Toronto, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board on Eligibility for Journalism Tax Measures, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, on a part-time basis, effective September 25, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
